intro:
The x makes it sound normal.

I am the owner of [PedoHub](/1PedoHubPRhuSRoVHspoeuTVvzHHxLM7Wf).

I also have a [blog](/1PexoLogqCsGAwYEUNqKnmzccg1r5tzCZ3) and a [0-gallery hub](/1PomfMoeTPxQ5gLJBeD1sBvaizxbHxf8Zv) full of lolicon hentai.

---

On topic imageboards on ZeroNet:
**Millchan**
[/LG/](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1NVmgh48yCnRsH7xaRJZhHHFk77CY1xzFt:LG:0)
[/younglove/](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1Sp6HCDXwnrRaRMRaaR8RuNXu2vqynJ6o:younglove:0)

---

post.body:
Hello ZeroMe!
I am pexo, the owner of PedoHub.
If you have questions, suggestions, concerns or just want to have a chat with me, feel free to tag me by adding `@Pexo: ` to your post.

I will post all updates and changes I make to PedoHub on here with this account.

The sections on PedoHub are now collapsible, which will hopefully be better, then being presented with a wall of text.

This was done in only CSS, which means that no javascript is executed, if you visit [PedoHub](/raw/1PedoHubPRhuSRoVHspoeuTVvzHHxLM7Wf).

Due to reasons outside of my control I had do be away from zeronet and the internet in general, but I'm happy to say I'm back, now.

First of all a warm welcome to all newcomers, that are still sticking around. If anyone needs help or has questions on anything zeronet, security, my zites on here, PedoHub or this(admittedly small) community feel free to ask me!

Since I was gone for a week, I wasn't able to answer any ZeroMails or any mentions on here. I'll try my best to find and respond to any mention that was made in that timeframe, but I may overlook some posts. Please add `@pexo:` to your post or make a new comment with `@pexo:` to make sure I see it.

PedoHub now supports `@08chan` IDs.
In other news I started a new certificate authority: `@pedohub`. 
`pedohub` IDs are currently manually created and handed out by me, so tell me if you want one.
I also added some explanations in regards to special IDs to the `specs`-section.

The source code is available on the [PedoHub GitCenter repo](/18rZnaZXpAYu86oQaJZYaXHBzZjSW9jCT7/) here on ZeroNet.

---

If any dev wants to support `@pedohub` IDs:
`"pedohub": ["1PedoHubVrLTi2PaeJmdVoem2DooJMj3HE"]`
Add this to `cert_signers` in the `user_contents` in your `data/users/content.json`.

PedoHub now supports @kusoneko IDs.

The source code is available on the [PedoHub GitCenter repo](/18rZnaZXpAYu86oQaJZYaXHBzZjSW9jCT7/) here on ZeroNet.

I'm currently working on quite a number of projects for ZeroNet. The big ones are:
- A image booru.
- A new ZeroMe zite that will work completely on the Tor Browser Bundle.
- A 'topic links'-ish zite that will double as a blocklist for regular ZeroNet users. This will make sure that it will always be as complete as it can possibly be.

Because my day has only so many hours, progress on those is pretty slow at the moment.  
So, if you have any programming skills and/or just want to help out with something, please do not hesitate to get in touch with me!

----

I decided to post updates on here more frequently from now on and, in general, be more active in terms of posts with this account.

comment.body:
Are you sure about this?
Also, it looks like the entire chan is in spanish(?).

Why not use millchan?
It has no hosting costs, cannot be shut down nor can it be a honeypot(no server side code).

@Dogolachan: True, but js is sandboxed on every zite and is visible to anyone and while escape bugs have been known in the past, they are still really rare and some ideas are thrown around to have HTML and CSS only zites on ZeroNet at some point. Over all I think it's still an huge improvement over server side hosting especially for images and media, since torrent architecture has proven in the past to scale really well. This means that hosting on ZeroNet will continue to be free as the zite grows, while server side (traditional) hosting just gets more and more expensive (storage and bandwidth).
So, how are you liking ZeroNet so far?

@Hgkhguyur47: You get used to it the more you explore over time.
If you have any questions feel free to ask!

Well depends on what you want, but in general [ZeroSites](/1SiTEs2D3rCBxeMoLHXei2UYqFcxctdwB) is a good starting place, then there is [ZeroName](1Name2NXVi1RDPDgf5617UoW7xA6YrhM9F/), [ImportantZites](/1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E)  and [ZeroWiki](/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/).
There are also a couple of search engines, with varying degrees of accuracy. [Euler finder](/13eFkhbXXQcJqd729zRLL9tMxxhz9d4UA6)(crypto miner!) or [Kaffiene Search](1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba) for example.

@1M14UaEEFz1JF4p:
@Shitnotworking: Pretty much, you either have to post the link(like you did) or upload the video somewhere else and link to it here, if you want it on ZeroNet.

You are already registered.
There isn't much content on PedoHub, in case you were wondering why you cant see much. Probably many lurkers, though.

It fails to download some files, but it is connecting.
It is Candy Doll stuff, in case someone was wondering.

@Spikymoth: Me too.
Neat timing, by the way.

@Masha: You mean zeronet in general or just ZeroMe?
In case of ZeroMe:
PedoHub has around 50 seeding peers which have been somewhat constant over the last month or so. Which means there are a number of people here, that for one reason or another are just lurking right now.
In case of ZeroNet in general:
More active then ZeroMe in terms of actual content(and not `Hello ZeroMe!`-posts). You can take a look at my profile for a (at least I think) complete list of ontopic stuff here on ZeroNet. Out of those millchans /LG/, /CP/, millchan engines(which is the same as millchan, but every board is a hub) /sweet/ are the most active ones (although 'most active' means 1.5 posts per day and maybe 4 posters right now)

@78919420: 
Basically this zite(=ZeroNet site) collects content from many other zites of type `ZEROME` (which are called hubs) and displays that collected content. Everyone can make a hub, this has the benefit that the developer of ZeroMe has no control over the content(=can't censor it).
@78919420: Or do you mean ZeroNet in general?

@78919420: You can click on `Everyone` on the ZeroMe homepage to see all posts you can currently have. ZeroMe collects the content only from the hubs you already have and PedoHub doesn't have much content sight now(aside from mountains of `Hello ZeroMe!`-posts). So if you want to see more, you need more hubs. You can find them in [ZeroSites](/1SiTEs2D3rCBxeMoLHXei2UYqFcxctdwB) or collections such as [Innocent childs room](/1J1epG5eMc4bsmh69UctBg4PHEe5B3kYHY/hubs.html)(this is a pretty complete one).

Good job!
@Masha: Well there are these two([1](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1552060063_1GDzVsFoYamHqWcYBcuvVWFCAt3Y5yPNde), [2](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1529178927_19Qid9uyfWCTmx2cUpDboEKCscRd4fRWrL)) ZeroTalk threads about it and [this](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA//?:users/1DJEfWgdJ3rGnqCrKwLrBdQGodRaEBkAry:zeronet:0) millchan thread, where this was attempted. Resolving these would be a nice thing to do. If you are done with optimizing, then you could also ask Nofish(ZeroNet dev) to include it in the Zeronet docs the best ways to do that is as an issue on [GitCenter](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/issues/?1P4w4Rvh4vS9r6G5xTiSh8qEW87EKZtnJB) or through [ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MaiL5gfBM1cyb4a8e3iiL8L5gXmoAJu27/?to=nofish). If you don't mind leaving clearnet traces and making an © Microsoft®™ account you can also make an issue on [github](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues)(Clearnet)
@Vidar0: So, how are you liking ZeroNet so far?

@Vidar0: Neat.
If you have any questions, concerns or just want to talk about things, feel free to do so.

@Masha: 
>Could you help seed?

I'm on it.

>can you see it or did it not get posted?

~~Doesn't show up on my end. Were there any errors? Were the download of the repo and gitcenter completed before you made the issue?~~
Just showed up for me.
@Masha: Looks like the issue from before also got through. There are now two of them.
@Masha: Was probably just some missing files then.

Banlists are collections of users/zites that a you can easily add to your local muted users/sites list(everything is added automatic you just need to enable the banlist). If the banlist owner decides to add a new user/zite to the banlist zeronet will automatically add the new user/zite to your muted list, if you enabled that list.
If you try to visit a muted zite a warning will appear, that you can dismiss and enter, it doesn't really ban/block anything.
A muted user will not be visible to you anymore anywhere and your zeronet client will not accept(download) new content from that user.

Whether or not you get on one depends on the owner of the blocklist(what the banlist is called), but generally speaking be civil and don't be a dick. The two major blocklists right now are styromaniacs [MOAB](/1LgqZfbtr6dukbjHdjWBEmmthq1shEv3y1) and ssdifnskdjfnsdjks [Pornography blocklist](/13CgSQeywg2ius5pjXVCk7dKUCRkz5xvW3/).
Both will not add you, if you don't post topic stuff publicly(hurts the image of ZeroNet). This is part of why I made PedoHub in the first place see [my public post](/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC/1541929362) on that.
(most) people here are actually fairly tolerant and can be reasoned with.
@Masha: You mean here on ZeroMe or in general?

@Skyfire: Basically, yes.
@Masha: 
Well freely only in a censorship way. The way ZeroMe works puts some limitations on with whom you can communicate with on other hubs.
**Posts**
The same way you can't see posts from hubs, that you haven't downloaded, yet, other people will not see posts on PedoHub, if they haven't downloaded it before. Most non-pedos will, for obvious reasons, in all likelihood not download PedoHub and thus not see any post you make.
**Comments**
Comments are in general stored twice, once on the hub you have your profile on(in other words: on your profile) and once on the hub where the user that made the post you commented under is registered. Hubs can decide on their own what ID providers they accept which means that if you have for example an `@kaffie.bit` ID, which is accepted on this hub, but not on the hub of the post you were commenting on, then your comment will only be stored once, on the hub you're on. In this case your comment is only visible to those, that have also downloaded the hub, that you're on(in your case PedoHub, which many non-pedos will most likely not download out of fear of CP).
~
In the case of comments, this is not that big of a deal for you two, since the ID provider you two are using (ZeroID) is accepted by all currently known ZeroMe hubs, which means that all people on ZeroMe will be able to read the comments you make under any post(as long as they have the hub the post was made on, since they need that in order to see the post in the first place).
In the case of your own posts on ZeroMe, most non-pedos will not have downloaded PedoHub and therefore not see it.
@Masha: Neat! If it's completely free of CP you can add it to [ZeroSites](/1SiTEs2D3rCBxeMoLHXei2UYqFcxctdwB) or [New ZeroNet Sites](/1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n), if you want.
Pretty busy right now, but fine right now. How about you?

You already did. As I said [here](/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC/1560798277) despite the high amount of registered accounts, the number of posts and content is pretty low at this point in time anyways. If you ask me, probably due to people not being sure what to do or not really trusting ZeroNet (which is not unjust, by the way, javascript is scary) and eventually leaving without really doing anything. The fact that Tor users can't upload images(see the `Why are my images/avatar white?`-section on PedoHub) without temporarily disabling the fingerprint detection probably didn't help either.

You already do. See my comment on the [post](/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH/?Post/1PedoHubPRhuSRoVHspoeuTVvzHHxLM7Wf/1NVevq4dMrSCRxrJpK4GDzq18Fz4CDps1g/1560881007) @Dirtysamurai made for more info.

@Thiscantbesteve: I'm really sorry, looks like I missed your post.
The content on PedoHub is user generated and since it's still pretty young there isn't really much there, yet. But since PedoHub is the second largest ZeroMe hub on ZeroNet(see [this](/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC/1560798277) post), there are probably lots of lurkers, though.

@Rinoa: Man, I'm stupid! Sorry, I thought the questions where meant as examples for things other people might have wondered, if they got here for the first time.  
  
So basically you don't need to go anywhere, simply visiting the hub once is already enough for the 'content' on PedoHub to show up on ZeroMe (or other zites(=ZeroNet sites) that support ZeroMe hubs, like `Piper` or `ZeroMe Reloaded`). 'Content' is in air quotes, because there's currently barely anything on here. Everything on PedoHub is user generated, but since 'we' have really low user activity despite having the second highest number of registered users on all of ZeroMe(see [this](/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC/1560798277) post), probably due to people seeing the lack of content, being confused or unsure of the security of ZeroNet and eventually leaving without interacting at all if you ask me.  
  
If you want CP right now, please don't forget to turn on Tor, this is p2p after all, and go to my profile(the `admin.pedohub` one), I maintain a list of on topic imageboards(chans) in my bio. From there on you can find links that will get you to more on topic places around here. If you want I can also send you the zites of which I know have cp/on topic stuff on them. I plan to (among other things) make a ZeroNet version of topic links at some point, but don't really have the time to actually do that.
The really good thing about ZeropNet is that you don't need to pay for hosting a website, which makes it impossible to find the owner of a zite and even if the owner is found (and the privatekey of the zite not discovered) the zite cannot be shut down, as long as people use it or turned into an honeypot after an TLA raid, but I'm getting off topic here.
Don't hesitate to ask if there's anything left unclear.
Also: Sorry for the wall of text.

@Humaabedin: 
A quick rundown: 
- ZeroNet sites are called zites.
- You will seed every zite you visit.
- If a file is set as `required` by the zite dev you will automatically download and seed it, if it isn't it'll be downloaded and seeded by you as soon you need it.
- There are two kinds of zites normal ones and merger ones.
- **normal**: All content is stored on one zite. The zite dev is basically a god and can do whatever he wants(deleting users/comments/...). Examples include ZeroTalk, millchan and 08chan
- **merger**: All content is stored on separate zites(called hubs), their sole purpose is storing the content/data. Another zite will then combine the data of all hubs of one type(`ZeroMe`, `millchan`, ...) and display it to the user. The zite dev cannot modify or delete any post/user and the owner of the hubs have no control over what JS runs on your browser. Examples include ZeroMe, millchan engine and 0gallery/1+gallery.

Do you need anything more specific?

You can visit [ZeroSites](/1SiTEs2D3rCBxeMoLHXei2UYqFcxctdwB) and use it as a starting point for exploring ZeroNet.
If you want more ontopic material you can take a look at my profile where I listed some imagebord boards from which you can carry on.
@Securitycypher: You can see a list of the hubs you currently seed on ZeroHello(somewhere at the bottom under `MERGED: ZEROME`) or do you mean something else?

@Securitycypher: No worries, we were all new at some point.

It may take me a while to respond, but feel free to ask me, if you have any Questions.

>Guessing most things are on the homepage once you download them then

Yes.

@Securitycypher: The you can see the content on ZeroMe.
PedoHub merely stores the data. It doesn't display(or run any javascript) anything. In short:
- PedoHub has control over the data, but not over the js and what's being displayed in what way
- ZeroMe has control over the js and what's being displayed in what way, but not over the data. 

I don't have much time at the moment, I can give you a more in depth explanation tomorrow, if you want.

Greetings!

Me too. I ended up making a modified version of ZeroMe that rendered all posts by PedoHub users red to better keep up with new users.

I assume you use tails?

@Xmanalive: [Tails](https://tails.boum.org/)(clearnet) is a portable OS designed to make every connection over tor. It also resets itself and wipes everything, every time you shut it down, so no trace of anything you did is left on your computer.
Using tails is currently the most secure way to browse the internet.

@Bagwet: Whether or not something will happen to you depends on which third world country you live in and how your government is treating you/your people.  
   
As an example, if you already live in a heavily surveilled region it's not really much effort for the government to crack down on that as well (it's essentially a few extra lines in a config file somewhere), if it wants to, that is.
But that aside TAILS will protect you. For technical reasons torrenting over tor (which tails uses) is a bit iffy (because of that there's no torrent/magnet software on tails out of the box), but this generally only gets relevant if a near-state level actor targets you specifically.  
  
Unfortunately with security and especially anonymity there's no single simple answer and most things come with an asterisk. But unless your government goes after you, specifically, and is willing to spend literal millions to find you, you will be safe if you use TAILS.

If there are still some things unclear or you want to know something, feel free to ask me! I'm always happy to help.

@Ignorance: Depends on who you're hiding from and what you're doing.
`VPN+Torrent <for legal or somewhat illegal things>` (pirating movies, films, anime and so on) is generally fine . But keep in mind it will protect you from copyright lawyers, not because it is impossible to find you, but because the cost of finding you is simply higher that what they can sue out of you. **A VPN does not and will never make you anonymous!**.
`VPN+Torrent <for highly illegal things>` (child porn, leaking government documents and so on) is always a bad idea. If you are noticed you will be found. To reiterate a VPN will not provide *any* protections against a strong legal entity!  
  
Im not sure what you mean by 'TAILS+TOR'. Everything on tails already runs over Tor by default. While there is a way to not use Tor on TAILS it involves jumping though some hoops first. But TAILS beats out a VPN in **every** case where it is important that you stay anonymous.

>also, can i download magnets via tor? i dont see any options to do that

Tor isn't a BitTorrent client/program.
What ypu'd need to do is essentially pointing your regular BitTorrent client/programs to your running tor instance(via SOCKS5). **However** because of how Tor, the BitTorrent protocol and most BitTorremt clients work, doing that is generally a bad idea and additional steps _must_ be taken to ensure that you don't leak your ip on accident (what specific steps need to be taken depends on your OS, BitTorrent client and is really not easy to figure out).
